# Staff Reports

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/staff-reports/

## Category
09 Staff And Payroll

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
REPORTS
Staff Reports
IN THIS ARTICLE
Payroll Report
Service & Product Sales By Staff Report
Time Clock Report
Days Off Report

This article covers the Staff reports available in the Reports app.

Staff reports can help you run payroll for your staff members, track services and products sold by each staff member, and more.

Link copied
Payroll Report

Learn more about the Payroll report and how you can process payroll directly in Mangomint.

The Payroll report includes all closed sales with a sale date in the selected time period. The sale date may be different than the date the sale was closed if you:

Manually change the sale date after the sale is closed

Require a full payment in online booking and close the sale on a later date. The sale date is the date the sale was closed, not the date the full payment was collected in online booking.

Link copied
Service & Product Sales By Staff Report

The Service & Product Sales By Staff report includes the quantities and sales totals for services and products sold by each staff member.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Service & Product Sales By Staff report.

Column

	

Description




Staff Member

	

The staff member’s name.




# Services

	

The number of completed services.




Service Sales

	

The staff member’s service sales total.




# Products

	

The number of products sold.




Product Sales

	

The staff member’s product sales total.




Total Sales

	

The staff member’s total sales.




Service Category/Service

	

The name of the service category and service.




Product Category/Product

	

The name of the product category and product.




Brand/Product

	

The name of the product brand and product.




Adjustments

	

The adjustments that were made to the default price during checkout.




Applied Packages

	

The value of applied packages and memberships.




Taxes

	

The amount of tax that was collected.




Sales

	

The sales total.

Link copied
Time Clock Report

The Time Clock report is available if the Time Clock app is enabled. This report provides information on staff member working hours, including hours spent on specific task types. A column will be included in the report for each task type.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Time Clock report.

Column

	

Description




Day

	

The day the staff member clocked in and out.




Staff

	

The staff member’s name.




Clock-In

	

The time when the staff member clocked in.




Clock-Out

	

The time when the staff member clocked out.




Paid Hours

	

The staff member’s paid hours.

Link copied
Days Off Report

The Days Off report includes days off for staff members during the selected time period and for the selected locations.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Days Off report.

Column

	

Description




Staff Member

	

The staff member’s name.




Day

	

The day the staff member was off/not working.




Reason

	

The reason the staff member was off/not working. The Other reason includes staff members who were Set to Not Working via the calendar.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
